verses.verse: דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> The words עָמ֔וֹס <S%H5986><s%> of Amos אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> was among בַנֹּקְדִ֖ים <S%H5349><s%> who was among the herdmen מִתְּק֑וֹעַ <S%H8620><s%> of Tekoa אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which חָזָ֨ה <S%H2372><s%> which he saw עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> concerning Israel בִּימֵ֣י ׀ <S%H3117><s%> in the days עֻזִּיָּ֣ה <S%H5818><s%> of Uzziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבִימֵ֞י <S%H3117><s%> and in the days יָרָבְעָ֤ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹאָשׁ֙ <S%H3101><s%> of Joash מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שְׁנָתַ֖יִם <S%H8141><s%> two years לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הָרָֽעַשׁ׃ <S%H7494><s%> the earthquake

וַיֹּאמַ֓ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> And he said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מִצִּיּ֣וֹן <S%H6726><s%> from Zion יִשְׁאָ֔ג <S%H7580><s%> will roar וּמִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> from Jerusalem יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and utter קוֹל֑וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice וְאָֽבְלוּ֙ <S%H56><s%> shall mourn נְא֣וֹת <S%H4999><s%> and the habitations הָרֹעִ֔ים <S%H7462><s%> of the shepherds וְיָבֵ֖שׁ <S%H3001><s%> shall wither רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> and the top הַכַּרְמֶֽל׃ <S%H3760><s%> of Carmel פ

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> For three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <S%H6588><s%> transgressions דַמֶּ֔שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> of Damascus וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and for four לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7725><s%> I will not turn away עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because דּוּשָׁ֛ם <S%H1758><s%> [the punishment] thereof because they have threshed בַּחֲרֻצ֥וֹת <S%H2742><s%> with threshing instruments הַבַּרְזֶ֖ל <S%H1270><s%> of iron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> Gilead

וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> But I will send אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house חֲזָאֵ֑ל <S%H2371><s%> of Hazael וְאָכְלָ֖ה <S%H398><s%> which shall devour אַרְמְנ֥וֹת <S%H759><s%> the palaces בֶּן־ הֲדָֽד׃ <S%H1130><s%> of Benhadad

וְשָֽׁבַרְתִּי֙ <S%H7665><s%> I will break בְּרִ֣יחַ <S%H1280><s%> also the bar דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> of Damascus וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <S%H3772><s%> and cut off יוֹשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitant מִבִּקְעַת־ <S%H1237><s%> from the plain אָ֔וֶן <S%H206><s%> of Aven וְתוֹמֵ֥ךְ <S%H8551><s%> and him that holdeth שֵׁ֖בֶט <S%H7626><s%> the sceptre מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> from the house עֶ֑דֶן <S%H5730><s%> delicate וְגָל֧וּ <S%H1540><s%> shall go into captivity עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> and the people אֲרָ֛ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria קִ֖ירָה <S%H7024><s%> unto Kir אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD פ

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> For three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <S%H6588><s%> transgressions עַזָּ֔ה <S%H5804><s%> of Gaza וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and for four לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7725><s%> I will not turn away עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because הַגְלוֹתָ֛ם <S%H1540><s%> [the punishment] thereof because they carried away captive גָּל֥וּת <S%H1546><s%> captivity שְׁלֵמָ֖ה <S%H8003><s%> the whole לְהַסְגִּ֥יר <S%H5462><s%> to deliver [them] up לֶאֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> to Edom

וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> But I will send אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire בְּחוֹמַ֣ת <S%H2346><s%> on the wall עַזָּ֑ה <S%H5804><s%> of Gaza וְאָכְלָ֖ה <S%H398><s%> which shall devour אַרְמְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H759><s%> the palaces

וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <S%H3772><s%> And I will cut off יוֹשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitant מֵֽאַשְׁדּ֔וֹד <S%H795><s%> from Ashdod וְתוֹמֵ֥ךְ <S%H8551><s%> and him that holdeth שֵׁ֖בֶט <S%H7626><s%> the sceptre מֵֽאַשְׁקְל֑וֹן <S%H831><s%> from Ashkelon וַהֲשִׁיב֨וֹתִי <S%H7725><s%> and I will turn יָדִ֜י <S%H3027><s%> mine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon עֶקְר֗וֹן <S%H6138><s%> against Ekron וְאָֽבְדוּ֙ <S%H6><s%> shall perish שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> and the remnant פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD פ

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> For three פִּשְׁעֵי־ <S%H6588><s%> transgressions צֹ֔ר <S%H6865><s%> of Tyrus וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and for four לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7725><s%> I will not turn away עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because הַסְגִּירָ֞ם <S%H5462><s%> [the punishment] thereof because they delivered up גָּל֤וּת <S%H1546><s%> captivity שְׁלֵמָה֙ <S%H8003><s%> the whole לֶאֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> to Edom וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and did not זָכְר֖וּ <S%H2142><s%> and remembered בְּרִ֥ית <S%H1285><s%> covenant אַחִֽים׃ <S%H251><s%> not the brotherly

וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> But I will send אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire בְּח֣וֹמַת <S%H2346><s%> on the wall צֹ֑ר <S%H6865><s%> of Tyrus וְאָכְלָ֖ה <S%H398><s%> which shall devour אַרְמְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H759><s%> the palaces פ

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> For three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <S%H6588><s%> transgressions אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and for four לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7725><s%> I will not turn away עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because רָדְפ֨וֹ <S%H7291><s%> [the punishment] thereof because he did pursue בַחֶ֤רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword אָחִיו֙ <S%H251><s%> his brother וְשִׁחֵ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> and did cast off רַחֲמָ֔יו <S%H7356><s%> all pity וַיִּטְרֹ֤ף <S%H2963><s%> did tear לָעַד֙ <S%H5703><s%> perpetually אַפּ֔וֹ <S%H639><s%> and his anger וְעֶבְרָת֖וֹ <S%H5678><s%> his wrath שְׁמָ֥רָה <S%H8104><s%> and he kept נֶֽצַח׃ <S%H5331><s%> for ever

וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> But I will send אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire בְּתֵימָ֑ן <S%H8487><s%> upon Teman וְאָכְלָ֖ה <S%H398><s%> which shall devour אַרְמְנ֥וֹת <S%H759><s%> the palaces בָּצְרָֽה׃ <S%H1224><s%> of Bozrah פ

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> For three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <S%H6588><s%> transgressions בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and for four לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7725><s%> I will not turn away עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because בִּקְעָם֙ <S%H1234><s%> [the punishment] thereof because they have ripped up הָר֣וֹת <S%H2030><s%> the women with child הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> order הַרְחִ֥יב <S%H7337><s%> that they might enlarge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּבוּלָֽם׃ <S%H1366><s%> their border

וְהִצַּ֤תִּי <S%H3341><s%> But I will kindle אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> a fire בְּחוֹמַ֣ת <S%H2346><s%> in the wall רַבָּ֔ה <S%H7237><s%> of Rabbah וְאָכְלָ֖ה <S%H398><s%> and it shall devour אַרְמְנוֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H759><s%> the palaces בִּתְרוּעָה֙ <S%H8643><s%> thereof with shouting בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day מִלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> of battle בְּסַ֖עַר <S%H5591><s%> with a tempest בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day סוּפָֽה׃ <S%H5492><s%> of the whirlwind

וְהָלַ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> shall go מַלְכָּ֖ם <S%H4428><s%> And their king בַּגּוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1473><s%> into captivity ה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> He וְשָׂרָ֛יו <S%H8269><s%> he and his princes יַחְדָּ֖ו <S%H3162><s%> together אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD פ
